item.title: Nexus: Dashboard for React and Next
item.description:
The ultimate dashboard template for React and Next.js

Made with React 18 and daisyUI 4

Available in 3 packages:

  • Starter â€“Single page dashboard for React

  • Standard â€“ Multi page dashboard for React

  • Pro â€“ Multi page dashboard for Next.js


Starter package includes:

  • Single page dashboard homepage


Standard and Pro packages include:

  • Dashboard homepage

  • Landing page

  • 6 ecommerce pages with tables and cards

  • File manager layout

  • Chat layout

  • 4 auth pages including login, register, password reset

  • 19 component page examples with all variants

  • 7 form component examples with all variants

item.title: Blog template for Astro
item.description:
Fully working multi page blog template made with daisyUI

Features:

  • Made with Astro, Markdown, Tailwind CSS and daisyUI

  • SEO friendly, Lightweight and fast

  • Dark mode and Light mode

Including:

  • Homepage

  • About page

  • Articles page

  • Articles archive with pagination

item.title: Mobile app landing page
item.description:
Landing page for mobile app introduction.

Features:

  • A landing page layout made with daisyUI 4

  • Available for HTML, React, Svelte, Vue ðŸ†•

Including:

  • 2 exclusive daisyUI themes (dark/light)

  • Compatible with all daisyUI themes (32 themes)

  • Responsive layout

  • Navbar, Hero section with gradient background, mobile mockups, stats, features section, testimonial slider, FAQ, footer with email form and social media icons

  • Theme changer menu

item.title: Agency landing page
item.description:
Landing page for agencies

Features:

  • Available for React and Svelte

  • Compatible with all daisyUI themes (32 themes)

Including:

  • A responsive landing page layout

  • Hero section, Partner logos, Services section, Testimonials, Team introduction, Footer with links and contact form

  • Theme changer toggle

item.title: SaaS landing page
item.description:
Production-ready landing page for software products.

Features:

  • SaaS landing page layout made with daisyUI 4

  • Available for HTML, React, Svelte, Vue ðŸ†•

Including:

  • 2 exclusive daisyUI themes (dark/light)

  • Compatible with all daisyUI themes (32 themes)

  • Hero section, Partner logos, Features section, Integrations cards, Pricing tables, FAQ accordion section, Footer with links and contact form

  • Pricing table with dynamic price toggle

item.title: Auth template
item.description:
Professionally designed auth pages to use in your project right away.

Features:

  • 3 HTML pages made with daisyUI 4

  • Framework agnostic. Can be used everywhere

  • Compatible with all 32 daisyUI themes

Including:

  • Login page

  • Signup page

  • Password recovery page

  • Form inputs with HTML validation and validation styles

  • Login with Google button

  • Toggle and Alert examples

item.title: Dashboard template
item.description:
Production-ready admin dashboard template to use in your project right now.

Features:

  • HTML admin dashboard layout made with daisyUI 4

  • Web component charts

  • Framework agnostic. Can be used everywhere

  • No dependencies

Including:

  • 2 exclusive daisyUI themes (dark/light) + Compatible with all 32 daisyUI themes

  • Responsive grid layout

  • 14 blocks of useful sections for dashboard

  • Sidebar with collapsible submenus

  • Tables and Item lists

  • Dropdown menus

  • Charts and forms
